alert.note: Alert for Hardin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 9:01PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hardin County through 930 PM CDT... At 901 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Village Mills, or near Kountze, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Silsbee, Kountze, Wildwood, Votaw, Village Mills, and Honey Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
